ImprovementType.Description: A Civic Center establishes an efficient location for city administration and planning, increasing construction efficiency and reducing Unrest.
Might as well put the lower class and those captives to good use. A labor camp increases production in the city.
A Monument expands the borders of the city they are built in. They also provide some protection against hostile magic, and additional Fame.
Guardian Statues animate to defend the city they are built in. They also provide some protection against hostile magic, and additional Fame.
Guardian Statues animate to defend the city they are built in. They also provide some protection against hostile magic, and additional influence.
Guardian Idols animate to defend the city they are built in. They can cast any spell your sovereign has access to. They also provide some protection against hostile magic, and additional influence.
Guardian Idols animate to defend the city they are built in. They can cast any spell your sovereign has access to. They also provide some protection against hostile magic, and additional influence.
Bell Towers keep a city running in an orderly manner by lowering Unrest.
Town Halls increase the borders of a city and reduce its Unrest level.
The city lucky enough to be graced with a Palace will see a Growth bonus and lower Unrest levels in the populace.
Alchemists utilize magic to increase the Mana and Research in a city. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of essence in the city.

GameModifier.Provides: Adds Growth, Healing and Vigour Potions to the city shop

ImprovementType.Description: Alchemy Labs increase the Material yields, Mana, and Research in a city via the arcane arts. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of essence in the city.

GameModifier.Provides: Adds Iru Elixir, Growth, Healing and Vigour Potions to the city shop

ImprovementType.Description: Apothecaries provide Mana every Season and produce consumable potions that champions can purchase. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of Essence in the city.

GameModifier.Provides: Adds Growth and Vigour Potions to the city shop

ImprovementType.Description: Herbalists provide Mana every Season.
Hedge Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Wooden Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Forts bolster a city's defenses by providing it with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to City Defenders.
Castles bolster a city's defenses by providing it with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to City Defenders.
Provides a Catapult and unit of Archers for city defense.
Training Yards increase the Accuracy of all units trained in a city while reducing their training costs.
Barracks decrease the training time for units trained in this city while also increasing their Accuracy.
Forges improve the defense of units trained in a city.
Forts bolster a city's defenses by providing it with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to City Defenders.
Castles bolster a city's defenses by providing it with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to City Defenders.
Provides a Catapult and unit of Archers for city defense.
Training Yards increase the Accuracy of all units trained in a city while reducing their training costs.
Barracks decrease the training time for units trained in this city while also increasing their Accuracy.
Forges improve the defense of units trained in a city.
Stone Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Stone Walls improve a city's defenses by providing it with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
The Firestone Castle provides defending Archers, an Initiative bonus to City Defenders and spawns a Firestone Guardian when attacked.
The Firestone Forge increases production, reduces the cost of armor production, and increases defence and fire resistance of units produced in this city
The Firestone Tower increases Fame and produces Mana, increasing the spell resistance of defending units, and adding Fire attack to units produced in this city
Ogre camps can be built on Ogre lairs to recruit Ogres.
Bone Ogre camps can be built on Ogre lairs to recruit Bone Ogres.
A Young Ogre Pit provides free Young Ogre units, but increase Unrest and decrease Food production.
A Ogre Pit provides free Ogre units, but increase Unrest and decrease Food production.
A Bone Ogre Pit provides free Bone Ogre units, but increase Unrest and decrease Food production.
An Troll Pit automatically produces Trolls in the city, however their presence causes some unrest among the populace.
An Troll Warrior Pit automatically produces Troll Warriors, however their presence causes some unrest among the populace.
Stables can be built on Wild Horses to provide extra food for the nation.

GameModifier.Provides: +10 Food per Grain for your Faction

ImprovementType.Description: Boar Yards provide you with a War Boar every 5 seasons.
A Beast Altar can be built on a Herdstone to amplify Beast power and provide Mana every season.
Beast Shrines upgrade from Beast Altars. They amplify Beast spells, provide additional Mana Fame every Season and increase the Hit Points of your units.
Air Altars can be built on Air Shards. They amplify Air spells and provide Mana every season.
Air Shrines upgrade from Air Altars. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Air Temples upgrade from Air Shrines. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Earth Altars can be built on Earth Shards. They amplify Earth spells and provide Mana every season.
Earth Shrines upgrade from Earth Altars. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Earth Temples upgrade from Earth Shrines. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Fire Altars can be built on Fire Shards. They amplify Fire spells and provide Mana every season.
Fire Shrines upgrade from Fire Altars. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Fire Temples upgrade from Fire Shrines. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Water Altars can be built on Water Shards. They amplify Water spells and provide Mana every season.
Water Shrines are upgraded from Water Altars. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Water Temples are upgraded from Water Shrines. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Death Altars can be built on Death Shards. They amplify Death spells and provide Mana every season.
Death Shrines upgrade from Death Altars. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Death Temples upgrade from Death Shrines. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.

A great battle was fought here and the unnamed dead were buried where they fell. When the cataclysm struck, the land flooded, and corpses floated to the surface of the mire and muck. Build a Monument here to tap into the Death power of this location.
+1 Orange Arcanium per 10 Seasons +1 Fame per Season +3 Death Power -1% Unrest -2% Unrest in all your cities
Requires a Swamp Terrain. Requires Town Specialization.
Faction Wonder, For Kingdoms with Death Adepts only.
Life Altars can be built on Life Shards. They amplify Life spells and provide Mana every season.
Life Shrines upgrade from Life Altars. They amplify Life spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Life Temples upgrade from Life Shrines. They amplify Life spells and provide additional Mana every season.

Here is the Valley of the Iru - a land untouched by the cataclysm, a land rippling with power of a world whole and undamaged, a memory of a time - and a place - that is no more. Build a Monument here to tap into the Life power of this location.
+1 Purple Arcanium per 10 Seasons +1 Fame per Season +3 Life Power -1% Unrest -2% Unrest in all your cities
Requires a Town Specialization.
Faction Wonder, For Empires with Life Adepts only.
A Battle Altar can be built on a Battlefield of Legend to amplify Battle spells and provide Mana every season.
Battle Shrines upgrade from Battle Altars. They amplify Battle spells, provide additional Mana every Season and a bonus to the experience earned by your units.

GameModifier.Provides: +5% Experience bonus for all your faction's units

ImprovementType.Description: Battle Temples upgrade from Battle Shrines. They amplify Battle spells, provide additional Mana every Season and a bonus to the experience earned by your units.

GameModifier.Provides: +5% Experience bonus for all your faction's units

ImprovementType.Description: A Beast Altar can be built on a Herdstone to amplify Beast power and provide Mana every season.
Beast Shrines upgrade from Beast Altars. They amplify Beast spells, provide additional Mana Fame every Season and increase the Hit Points of your units.
Beast Temples upgrade from Beast Shrines. They amplify Beast spells, provide additional Mana every Season and increase the Hit Points of your units.
A Nature Altar can be built on a Scenic View to amplify Nature spells and provide Mana every season.
Nature Shrines upgrade from Nature Altars. They amplify Nature spells and provide Fame every Season.
Nature Temples upgrade from Nature Shrines. They amplify Nature spells and provide additional Mana and Fame every Season.

Needs a description and fancy name.
+1 Green Arcanium per 10 Seasons +1 Fame per Season +3 Nature Power -1% Unrest -2% Unrest in all your cities
Requires a Hill or a Forest Terrain. Requires a Conclave Specialization.
Faction Wonder, For Empires with Nature Adepts only.
A Shadow Altar can be built on a Cavern of Shadows to amplify Shadow spells and provide Mana every season.
Shadow Shrines upgrade from Shadow Altars. They amplify Shadow spells and provide a dodge bonus to your units.

GameModifier.Provides: +4 Dodge bonus for all your faction's units

ImprovementType.Description: Shadow Temples upgrade from Shadow Shrines. They amplify Shadow spells, and provide additional Mana every Season and a dodge bonus to your units.

GameModifier.Provides: +4 Dodge bonus for all your faction's units

ImprovementType.Description:
Needs a description and fancy name.
+1 Grey Arcanium per 10 Seasons +1 Fame per Season +3 Shadow Power -1% Unrest -2% Unrest in all your cities
Requires a River or an Arctic Terrain. Requires a Town Specialization.
Faction Wonder, For Kingdoms with Shadow Adepts only.
Training Yards increase the Accuracy of all units trained in a city while reducing their training costs.
Barracks decrease the training time for units trained in this city while also increasing their Accuracy.
Command Posts improve the training of units, causing them to take less time to train and providing them with a number of bonuses.

The War College greatly increases the quality of all units trained in the city it's built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in the city with your War College will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained units get +25% Attack vs units of the opposite race

ImprovementType.Description: Warrior Temples increase the quality of all units trained in the city they're built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in cities with Warrior Temples will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained Units get +25% Attack vs damaged enemies

ImprovementType.Description: Crystal Quarrys can be built on Crystal Deposits. They provide you with Crystal every Season.
Crystal Mines upgrade from Crystal Quarries. They provide you with additional Crystal every Season.
Crystal Troves upgrade from Crystal Mines. They provide you with additional Crystal every Season.
Snow Giant Camps can be built on Snow Giant lairs to recruit Snow Giant Warriors.
Improves a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders. Spawns a Firestone Guardian when attacked.
Stables can be built on Wild Horses to provide Horses (1 every 5 seasons), and 1 Material in the nearest city.
A Horse Markets produces 1 horse every 5 turns
Increases the borders and sight of this outpost, and increases initiative for friendly units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: +10% Initiative to friendly units in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Vigilant Watchtowers expand the borders of the city they are built in, and increasing the initiative of defending units.
Increases the attack and defense of friendly units in this outpost's borders. Increases movement of friendly units in this outpost's borders. Provides a free unit of Border Guard.

GameModifier.Provides: +25% Attack to friendly units in Zone of Control
+25% Defense to friendly units in Zone of Control
Doubles friendly units movement in Zone of Control
Recruit a unit of Border Guard

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the attack and defense of friendly units in this outpost's borders. Increases movement of friendly units in this outpost's borders. Provides a free unit of Border Guard.

ImprovementType.Description: Markets provide additional Gildar every Season in cities they are built in.
Merchants are a great source of additional Gildar.

Tower of Dominion increases Growth and negates the Unrest penalty from the amount of cities in your empire. It also increases Fame and is a great way to attract your first Champion.
In addition the Tower of Dominion provides +1 Zone of Control, +1 Essence, -10% Unrest, and an extra unit of City Defenders and Archers.

GameModifier.Provides: Negates the unrest penalty from the amount of cities in your empire

ImprovementType.Description: The Sage meticulously looks over ancient texts in an effort to recover lost technologies, boosting Research.
Cloisters increase Research in cities they are built in.
Libraries increase the Research in any city they are built in.

GameModifier.Provides: Spawns a new quest within 4 tiles

ImprovementType.Description: The Great Archive will greatly increase our Research efforts in the city it's constructed in.

Ancient Temples can only be built on temple ruins. They increase the amount of Research your faction generates.
They also provide generate Fame for your faction.
A Summoning Gate provides an increase to a factions Summon Pool.
Raiders Halls give all units trained in a city the Raider trait (+20% Accuracy and Attack vs. units stationed in cities - including Militia, and +2 Initiative on the first turn of combat).

GameModifier.Provides: Trained units get +20% Accuracy and Attack vs. units stationed in cities - including Militia, and +2 Initiative on the first turn of combat

ImprovementType.Description: Workshops boost the Production a city gets from its Material yields.
Masons improve the production and construction efficiency of cities they are built in.
Mills improve the production and construction efficiency of cities they are built in.
The Labor Guild will greatly improve Production and construction efficiency in the city it's built in.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Production per Material in all your cities

ImprovementType.Description: Slave Pens increase Production and construction efficiency and prevent this city's Production from being impacted by Unrest.

The Wizards Tower allows the practitioners of the arcane arts to further hone their talents. Grants +5 Spell Mastery and Resistance to trained units, +1 Essense in the city, and auto summons a defending Mage unit when the city is attacked.
The Tower of Arcana generates Arcana which can be used to cast strategic spells. It also increases the city Essence yield, and spawns a Mage unit to help defend the city when attacked.

GameModifier.Provides: Faction can cast Arcane Outpost, Arcane Riftwalk and Arcane Tempest

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the player's borders and improves their visibility.
A Young Sacred Grove can be built on Forest Groves to recruit Young Forest Guardians.
A Sacred Grove can be built on Forest Groves to recruit Forest Guardians.
An Ancient Sacred Grove can be built on Forest Groves to recruit Ancient Forest Guardians.
Tygal Stables provide you with a Tygal every 5 seasons.
Hedge Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Wooden Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
